ko: 어디서 들어본 적이 있는 것 같긴 한데, 정확히 기억나진 않아.
화가 나거나 답답할 때 속을 풀다.

en: Born with a silver spoon in one’s mouth
To go from rags to riches
Pay an arm and a leg for something
To give someone a run for their money
As genuine as a three-dollar bill
Cost an arm and a leg
Put one’s foot in one’s mouth

ko: 미꾸라지 한 마리가 온 웅덩이를 흐린다.

en: Out of the frying pan into the fire
Every cloud has a silver lining
A rising tide lifts all boats
In the eye of the storm
Make a mountain out of a molehill
Bury your head in the sand
Between a rock and a hard place
To hold out an olive branch
Can’t see the forest for the trees
The grass is always greener on the other side
